Aric Chokey

Data journalist and developer

About

I'm Aric, a digital storyteller, data journalist and inherent creator of copy and code. I'm currently a legislative reporter for the Associated Press covering the Indiana Legislature and the coming state elections.


In my experience so far, I've had a chance to wear a few hats in digital communication doing web producing, copy editing, news editing, beat and graphic reporting and social media strategy.

I'm Aric, a digital storyteller, data journalist and inherent creator of copy and code. I'm currently a legislative reporter for the Associated Press covering the Indiana Legislature and the coming state elections.


In my experience so far, I've had a chance to wear a few hats in digital communication doing web producing, copy editing, news editing, beat and graphic reporting and social media strategy.


I've spent most of the previous few years as a reporter but have also had gigs in government and startups.


I've also just finished my undergraduate degree from Ball State's multimedia journalism program. I spent four years in the program learning how to leverage digital tools to best tell a story.


I spend a lot of time reading about trends in web publishing, investigative journalism, UX design and front-end methodologies. I usually tweet a lot of the ideas and material I come across, so connect with me on Twitter and see which ideas I'm tossing around.

Web work

Bike ride map

An editor at the Tampa Bay Times rode his bike down all of Florida. I helped optimize a print map of the journey for web and hooked up a JavaScript parallax effect to animate an SVG path.

Ball State's new president

I wrote a feature story and included a StoryMapJS ahead of the new chief's State of the University address.

Courts website

I built a tumblr template for a local court to house its self-litigation resources and news releases.

Natural amenities

I made two interactive D3 maps to show how Florida and U.S. counties rank for best scenery and climate according to data released by the USDA.

Indiana median income

This D3 chart showcases the change in median income in Indiana.

U.S. GDP growth

This JavaScript-based chart for the Tampa Bay Times supplements a story about GDP growth.

U.S. job growth

For the Tampa Bay Times, this JavaScript chart uses ChartistJS to show U.S. job growth.

Employment analysis

I researched job growth for a state senator, visualized it and then developed talking points for him based on different angles of the data.

Constituent Surveys

During my time at the Indiana Senate, I compiled results from voter surveys into graphic reports that went directly to state senators.
